data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Dhamar, Yemen by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dhamar, Yemen
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Dhamar, Yemen and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 336 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, train the church of Dhamar, Yemen to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Malay people.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Dhamar to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Dhamar, Yemen a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Dhamar, Yemen has a population of 1,603,000.

We estimate Dhamar has 336 people who might know Jesus, 2,846 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,599,819 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4,770 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Dhamar, Yemen.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
